summary: The BuildRequest requires a very narrow change: update only one specific Hero in frontend/src/App.tsx (exact src and className) and make no other changes anywhere. The diff evidence is truncated and does not show the targeted element, so the required change cannot be verified from the provided diff summary. Additionally, files other than App.tsx were modified, which conflicts with the “no other code/markup/styling anywhere else” acceptance criterion.

missing_requirements.requirement: In frontend/src/App.tsx, update ONLY the Hero section logo at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1] to have src="/assets/Gadget Zone-Logo-1.png" and className="h-24 md:h-32 mx-auto mb-6", without changing any other attributes (e.g., alt) and without modifying anything else in the project.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff for frontend/src/App.tsx is truncated and does not include the Hero markup; therefore there is no direct evidence that the specified src/className were updated exactly, nor that no other attributes on that were left unchanged.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified additional project files beyond the single targeted change (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest/AC explicitly require that no other code/markup/styling anywhere else in the project is modified as part of this change, but the diff lists other modified files.

hallucinated_features.description: Claims of unrelated changes/features (e.g., global CSS OKLCH system, tailwind config changes, added SVG texture asset, SEO meta changes, components like BusinessHighlightsStrip / WhatsAppQuickMessages / MobileCareSmartUsageGuideSection, map link standardization).
hallucinated_features.reason: These items are not requested and are listed in frontend-file-summaries.txt as part of the project, conflicting with the constraint to only change the selected . The diff summary does not show corresponding file modifications for those paths (only the summary file itself was modified), making them appear as unrequested additions/claims.
